name: Mantis Burn RacingÂ®
description: The race is on in Mantis Burn Racing, where fast-paced bumper-to-bumper racing combines with intuitive, tactile gameplay and stunning visuals in one of the best-looking and immersive top-down racers around.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 500 series DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 4200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0C compatible
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: 2.0+ GHz Dual Core Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 700 series plus DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 4200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0C compatible

reviews.review_text: It's a fun game! Recommend it!
